column1: annie ruth morris| mrs. annie ruth morris of trumann died tuesday
column3: 2015 at st. bernards medical center in jonesboro
column6: 9 months and 12 days. mrs. morris was born friday
column10: and had lived most of her lifetime in the trumann. she was a housewife and of the baptist faith. mrs. morris was preceded in death by her husband
column11: junior j. b. morris; one son
column13: cody austin banks and her parents
column14: oscar william and rendy eakes jones. . survivors include two daughters
column25: and several great-grandchildren. funeral services will be friday morning at 10:00 a. m. in the chapel of thompson funeral home in trumann with rev. leon minick and rev. jim morgan officiating. burial will follow in jonesboro memorial park cemetery in jonesboro
column26: ark. pallbearers will be steve roberson
column30: shorty jones and david blasingame. visitation will be friday morning from 9:00 a. m. to 10:00 a. m. at thompson funeral home. an online guest book can be signed at www. thompsonfuneralhome. net.
